features: ✔ADJUSTABLE STRAP & COLLAPSIBLE SHAPE – The car trash bag features an adjustable strap that allows it to be attached on both front and back headrest as well as the center console for easier access for all around. Coupled with the collapsible design, you will greatly benefit from functional convenience of this auto trash container.

✔MAGNETIC SNAPS: There are 4 metallic magnetic snaps inside of HOTOR car trash can for fastening the extra trash bag. Compared with traditional car trash cans, those 4 little snaps make the replacement of car trash bags easier. Simply unsnap the magnetic snaps to replace the used trash bag with a new one. Then snap shut the magnetic snaps to fix the extra trash bag. Just 2 steps and and it's all set.
✔DURABLE LEAKPROOF INNER LINING – This garbage can for car adopt waterproof and leakproof material, easy to clean and wash. No more worry about food spills or other stubborn stain.

✔MULTIPURPOSE – This car garbage bin can be used as storage bag to keep items such as cups, toys, and other accessories. Additionally, the waterproof advantage also makes it an excellent car cooler of the maximum value for money.

✔GREAT COMPATIBILITY – An effective solution for people with the needs of neat and organized car interior. Perfectly fits a variety of types including sedans, SUV, truckers, etc. HOTOR takes every conceivable possibility into account.

What are the 4 hard plastic pieces used for? Small plastic plates are used to support the straps on the two sides which makes the car trash can more three-dimensional and couldn't be collapsed. Does the hotor car trash can remain waterproof without the plastic trash bag? The inside of the bin has a waterproof liner,we can easily wipe it off, but we don't recommend pouring liquid directly into it Is it available for any types of cars? Yes, this product could be applied to any types of cars, and it works pretty well! How to fix the trash bag? There are several magnets inside of this car trash can, which are designed to fix the trash bag. This design not only makes the replacement of tarsh bag become easier, but also prevents trash bags from falling off perfectly.

Who We Are Drive Safely, Stay Comfortably HOTOR is born with the mission to make your car the second home to live in, a cozy zone with everything in place, including inconspicuous trash and fine dust. Over the past several years, it has grown up to be a youth of more love and responsibilities, trying to be a warmhearted partner to better your driving experience with more premium products. We are both on the way, you home, making the car itself your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great can/bag, but without question the BEST Customer Service of any company I've ever dealt with
reviews.reviewText: I bought the HOTOR 3-gallon car trash can. FIRST, I'll tell you that the trash can is great and even better than I'd hoped. It will definitely do the job I want it to do, and it will be very easy to maintain since the removeable bags will keep it clean. It's large enough to also serve another function very specific to our needs that is totally different from that of a trash can. Let me explain. My wife has had MS since May 1975 and is now confined to a power chair. We had an Acura MDX with a lift for her chair, but we had to trade it for a van that has ramp she can drive her chair into and then anchor it into a locking system in the passenger side. It's when she's not with me that I realized there was a problem. I had pulled into a fast-food restaurant and ordered food to take home. So far so good. The problem? When they handed me the bag of food, I turned to put them in the passenger seat, and ... then realized that there was none! I drove home carefully, but the bag skidded all over the van from front to back and side to side! You see, there's no carpet since the power chair would tear it up. The floor is a durable, smooth surface and works well for the chair and works well if your food wants to leave sandwiches and French fries all over the van! Back to the trash can. After getting it, I found that, with the top opened, the can works perfectly well as a place to put beside the driver's seat and a fast-food bag fits in it quite nicely. I keep clean bags in it thanks to Lily in Customer Service. That (finally, right) brings me to the SECOND thing and the best thing about my purchase. Folks, the customer service I've received has been nothing except fantastic! What did I contact Customer Service you ask? Not any problem with the garbage can. It's great. My issue was that I bought the 3-gallon can and I wanted to buy a supply of HOTOR 3-gallon bags for it. All I could find was links to buy their 2-gallon bags. So, I had the great experience of contacting Lily in HOTOR Customer Service asking for help. Ladies and gentlemen, she has been extraordinary to say the least! First, she told me that she was just going to send me 50 replacement bags that fit my 3-gallon can ... for free. And she did. Then she sent me a link to use for getting more bags. It was then that she told me that their 2-gallon bags also fit the 3-gallon can! They're big enough. I suggested to Lily that she might pass along my suggestion to those who do their Internet marketing that they mention on their 3-gallon can links that you can use the bags advertised as 2-gallon bags. She thought that was a good idea. I hope someone else thinks so too. Suffice it to say that I've had 14 emails back and forth with Lily and each time she has been helping me with suggestions, soliciting feedback from me, or asking for suggestions how to make their product better, etc. No matter what time of night (e.g., even 3:00 AM or 4:00 AM) I'd email her I'd get a reply almost immediately. The woman never sleeps! She has promised to help me whenever I might need something in the future no matter what it is. So, to summarize, the trash can is terrific, the bags are great and the magnets to hold them in are very nice, BUT the Customer Service is actually unbelievable! Although I don't see a problem you'll have with their products, even if you do have a problem or a question, you'll never have one that Lily won't solve for you ... no matter what time of day (or night) it might be!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice little addition to help keep the car tidy
reviews.reviewText: After years of just dropping a used shopping bag in the back to use as a rubbish bin, fishing around without looking trying to drop a rapper or Kleenex into it and only mostly succeeding, I decided to spring for something more grown up.This has worked perfectly. It fits right behind the console of our small crossover. The console lid which opens so I just ran the straps under it, making sure it didn't get pinched in the hinges and pulled it as snuggly as possible.If you are going to need to use the middle seat of the back row, you'll need to remove it and place it elsewhere. But we seat at most four and so it doesn't need to be at anyone's feet.The top with the slits that give way as you drop trash in is nice as you don't have to lift anything and it's easy to ensure trash is in the bin while preventing it from bouncing out from an ill-aimed throw or whatever. I haven't bought the official replacement liners yet though I'm considering it. The bin came with two. I suspect we can go back to using the used shopping bags as liners when these two are full. But we'll see when the time comes. The ones that come with it are just the right size and thickness to be pinned perfectly by the magnetic clips on the inside designed to hold them in.The bin comes with two plastic braces (and two replacements) that you slide into sleeves on the side to keep the bin square at the top. Do know that you will have to apply quite a bit of force to get them bent and into the sleeves. So much so that I feared I was going to snap them. I didn't, thankfully, but the possibility, I assume, is why they include the extras.So far, very happy with it. Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice, good sized trash can, has little side pockets as well which I think is cool. It comes with 4 little metal things to hold a bag inside it but it’s a little annoying to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicer than I expected. Good purchase!
reviews.reviewText: Very well made and comes with small support bars for shape support and also 2 bag liners. The bag has interior snaps to hold the liner in place. I am very impressed with quality and it looks just like the pictures. Nice colors not dull at all. Convenient strap holds it to you headrest. You have to be patient working the small support bars into place but they fit just take your time so you don't rip the bag. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty darn good for an affordable car trashcan.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I got tired of either keeping a plastic grocery bag in my car for trash or simply stockpiling trash until I felt the need to empty my car out. After several months this trashcan does its job and is very convenient for those who wish to maintain a clean car. I don't have kids but I purchased one for a friend who does and she found it to be amazing. I have no idea how leak/waterproof this item is as I have yet to put any kind of liquid in it. The item comes with 2 trashbags made for the item and you can easily purchase any small-size trash bags (Base it off the gallon size of the item) and they will do the trick. The only complaint I have about this item was that I was expecting it to be a more sturdy-box-like item but when it arrived I discovered that it's basically an inexpensive lunch box that's deflated. However, this concern is no longer a problem for me as once you set it up the shape holds and it is able to hold plenty of trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super great idea. This makes keeping my car clean a breeze. Great value. And cute too!There’s little snaps inside that hold a trash bag in place which is a nice touch. There’s little plastic inserts to help keep the form of the product right. I like hanging it on my front seat so it’s easily accessible, but that does mean I have to move it every time someone sits in the front seat. It doesn’t do too well free standing.
Este bote de basura para el coche es todo lo que dice la descripción. Estoy muy conforme con la compra. Ya tengo un mes usandolo y me ha funcionado muy bien. Aun no lo uso como hielera
Brilliant & stylish bin for a vehicle...easy to install & gives a premier look inside the car...have got it installed in my Jeep Compass...a little expensive but worth the buy...

reviews.reviewTitle: Not as advertised, smaller product and not brand
reviews.reviewText: Not the same product as in pictures, no brand name and 30% smaller than advertised.
es perfecto para esos viajes largos, seadapto perfecto al carro. lo recomiendo ampliamente###

I was trying to find something discrete and useful at the same time, after buying some others car trash can I gave this one a try and I am amazed by the quality, very well made holds a lot of tissue paper (that is the main reason because of my morning allergy) come with 2 plastic bags and is super easy to put on. Highly recommended.
